src/models/currency.py.description: Currency models for multi-currency pricing: ExchangeRate (stores exchange rates with Numeric(18,6) precision, from_currency/to_currency fields, fetched_at timestamp, is_stale property for 48h check) and UserCurrencyPreference (stores user email and preferred currency code). SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES constant defines valid currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, BRL.

src/core/scheduler.py.description: APScheduler module for scheduled tasks. Uses AsyncIOScheduler with UTC timezone. Key functions: init_scheduler(run_immediately=True) starts scheduler and optionally fetches exchange rates on startup, shutdown_scheduler() for graceful cleanup, update_exchange_rates_job() runs daily at midnight UTC to update exchange rates via ExchangeRateService.fetch_latest_rates(), get_scheduler_status() returns job info for monitoring.

src/api/v1/schemas/currency.py.description: Pydantic schemas for multi-currency API: CurrencyCode enum (USD/EUR/GBP/BRL), CurrencyPreferenceRequest/Response for user preferences, CurrencyConversionRequest/Response for price conversions, ExchangeRatesResponse for rate data with stale detection, SchedulerStatusResponse for monitoring. All use Field() validators with proper descriptions.
